children.description:
Excellent! I've successfully retrieved rental property listings for Lisbon. Let me summarize the findings for you.

I'll call the Finish function with a comprehensive answer:

{"return_type": "give_answer", "final_answer": "I found rental properties in Lisbon, Portugal. Here's a summary of one of the available properties:

🏠 Property Details:
- Price: €320/month
- Type: Flat
- Size: 200 sq meters
- Rooms: 9
- Bathrooms: 3
- Location: Avenida Praia da Vitória, Avenidas Novas district
- Available: Now

Additional Property Features:
- Minimum rental duration: 27 days
- External Reference: 655306
- Full listing available at: https://www.idealista.pt/imovel/33960506/

This is just one of the available properties. I recommend visiting the provided URL or contacting the listing agent for more detailed information, viewing schedules, and to explore more rental options in Lisbon."}

function.name: properties_list_for_idealista_v2
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "idealista_v2", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "List properties for sale or rent in Italy, Spain, Portugal with options and filters"

locationname.description: The value of name field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint.

locationid.description: The value of locationId field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint. Do NOT use together with zoiId parameter

floorheights.description: One of the following topFloor|intermediateFloor|groundFloor (separated by comma for multiple values. Ex :  topFloor,groundFloor)

accessible.description: true|false - Whether or not is the property accessible

distance.description: The radius to look for properties inside

ispoi.description: true|false - Whether or not is it a point of interest, this parameter only works with zoiId parameter

maxitems.description: The number of items per response for paging purpose

zoiid.description: The value of zoiId field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint. Do NOT use together with locationId parameter

numpage.description: The page index for paging purpose

shape.description: The value of shape field returned in .../zois/detail endpoint. Simply pass the json object as string. Do NOT use together with locationId or zoiId. Ex : {\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"coordinates\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\":[[[[9.20289,45.469786,0],.

auction.description: Leave empty or one of the following : excludeAuctions|onlyAuctions

housemates.description: One of the following 2|3|4 (separated by comma for multiple values, Ex : 3,4)

sincedate.description: One of the following Y|W|M  (Last 48 hours|Last week|Last month)

function.name: zois_detail_for_idealista_v2
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "idealista_v2", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get information about specific zone of interest"

zoiid.description: The value of zoiId field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint

function.name: properties_detail_for_idealista_v2
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "idealista_v2", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get property detail"

propertycode.description: The value of propertyCode field returned in .../properties/list endpoint

function.name: auto_complete_for_idealista_v2
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "idealista_v2", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get auto complete suggestion by term or phrase"

prefix.description: Any term or phrase that you are familiar with

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

train_messages.content:
You are AutoGPT, you can use many tools(functions) to do the following task.
First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, you need to give your thought to analyze the status now and what to do next, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.
Remember: 
1.the state change is irreversible, you can't go back to one of the former state, if you want to restart the task, say "I give up and restart".
2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
Let's Begin!
Task description: You should use functions to help handle the real time user querys. Remember:
1.ALWAYS call "Finish" function at the end of the task. And the final answer should contain enough information to show to the user,If you can't handle the task, or you find that function calls always fail(the function is not valid now), use function Finish->give_up_and_restart.
2.Do not use origin tool names, use only subfunctions' names.
You have access of the following tools:
1.idealista_v2: Query for rent and sale properties in Spain, Italy, Portugal
